news.title: Zelensky ready for 'honest work' with US to end Ukraine war
news.summary: Kyiv says it is willing to engage with a US-backed draft peace plan aimed at ending the war with Russia.

news.title: The curious case of why Poundland is struggling during a cost-of-living crisis
news.summary: Why - in an age where so many of us are feeling the financial pinch - are some budget shops on UK high streets having such a tough time?

news.title: How WhatsApp messages revealed ex-Reform politician's pro-Russian bribes
news.summary: The former leader of Reform UK in Wales has admitted bribery and will be sentenced on Friday.

news.title: Mexico's Fatima Bosch, who walked out on organisers, crowned Miss Universe
news.summary: She made headlines when she walked out of a pre-pageant event after being told off by an organiser.

news.title: Strictly star arrested on suspicion of rape
news.summary: Hertfordshire Police said the man had been released on bail under investigation.

news.title: Friday-night drug deals helping Russian war machine, UK crime agency warns
news.summary: The National Crime Agency says a "vast criminal ecosystem" funds "really bad things" around the world.

news.title: Energy price cap fall expected as temperatures plunge
news.summary: Regulator Ofgem will announce its next price cap, affecting the bills of millions of people from January.

news.title: Serious Fraud Office was warned about diamond scam but decided not to act
news.summary: Whistleblower reported diamond retailer “Vashi” to the Serious Fraud Office a year before it collapsed.

news.title: Biggest prostate cancer screening trial in decades begins in UK
news.summary: The study aims to find the best way to detect prostate cancer - the most common cancer in men in the UK.

news.title: School repairs left unfinished as firm behind huge PFI contract goes into liquidation
news.summary: The news heightens concerns that 88 schools in Stoke-on-Trent could be left with unfinished work.
